participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: practical and family-oriented, values hands-on work.
participant_1.background: i'm a plumber. my wife and kids are the best. i've three children. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: creative and energetic, enjoys staying active and trying new things.
participant_2.background: i dance on the weekends. i compete in dog agility classes. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange.

content.text: I 'm looking for a plumber. What about you?
